title: OG Image Generator
description: Takes a screenshot of an Apify actor's detail page, and generates a nice image for sharing.

actorUrl.title: Actor URL
actorUrl.description: The Apify Store URL of the actor for which you want to generate an Open Graph image

type.title: Image format
type.description: Choose whether you want the image to be in JPEG or PNG format

scale.title: Image scale
scale.description: Depending on the size of image you need, adjust the scale

debug.title: Debug
debug.description: In case you want to store the HTML and slow it down.
